item.title: Why some hope the IRS’s free tax-prep program becomes the next Obamacare
item.description: The longer the Direct File tax-prep program sticks around, the harder it is to end it, critics worry.

item.title: American Airlines’ weaker-than-expected guidance ‘not as negative’ as it appeared, says analyst
item.description: American Airlines cited “present demand trends” and fuel-price forecasts as it predicted a first-quarter loss.

item.title: Oil turns lower as traders assess Trump tariff threats, efforts to lower crude prices

item.title: Trump tells Davos he’ll demand that interest rates drop. It’s a fresh jab at the Fed.
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump delivered remarks Thursday in a video appearance at the World Economic Forum’s annual gathering in Davos, Switzerland.
